name: Not 4 Usual Games 非“常”四作
name_original: Not 4 Usual Games 非“常”四作
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello gamer, have you ever played Tetris, Minesweeper, Space Invaders or Pac-Man?

Doesn't matter! Introducing the fan-remake of the classic games using state-of-the-art graphic and music! ... and ... unexpected things may happen!

This is a fun coffee-time mini game that may recall your childhood memories! 

Play the game use your mouse & keyboard, and see how long you can finish the whole thing!

*The game may collect your play data for educational purpose~ ୧(๑•̀⌄•́๑)૭✧
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

你有玩过《俄罗斯方块》、《扫雷》、《小蜜蜂》和《吃豆人》吗？没关系，在这款游戏里你将体验到超酷炫现代画风的小游戏高清版! 

...不要以为真的这么简单哦！

这是一款闲暇时间体验的微小游戏，可能会勾起你很多儿时美好回忆!

游戏使用键盘和鼠标来游玩！

*游戏中会有个小问卷来收集你的第一次游玩讯息~ 感谢！！(*´・ω・`)⊃
